spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The medic is a 3rd-level Boros spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 11}). The medic has the following cleric spells prepared:

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
